name: Safe Place for Dust
description:
Controls: Left, right and up arrow keys

Do you know why the universe is so dark

It's cuz you're not really looking

If you only agreed to close your eyes

The day would go faster

And those planets so far away from us

They come down

Like a glorious rainstorm

So small and so many places without end

The world we transform

We're in a

Safe place for dust

Safe space from dusk

x2

The stars were made so long ago

I can't even remember

Our mother and our father are stars

and we are dust

Our hearts are too tender

And every solution brings me to you

The planets they turn they rotate but we're blue

Mother Earth we grew up too soon

You should have allowed us to dance on the moon

ooooooh

Safe place for dust

ooooooh

Safe space from dusk
